remarks: The inverse of an element of the free group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
frgpadd.w $e |- W = ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) $.
frgpadd.g $e |- G = ( freeGrp ` I ) $.
frgpadd.r $e |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) $.
frgpinv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
frgpinv.m $e |- M = ( y e. I , z e. 2o |-> <. y , ( 1o \ z ) >. ) $.
frgpinv $p |- ( A e. W -> ( N ` [ A ] .~ ) = [ ( M o. ( reverse ` A ) ) ] .~ ) $.
$d .~ y z $.
$d I y z $.
$d W y z $.
